👉 $CAR : Avis Budget Group reported quarterly earnings of $6.63 per share which beat the analyst consensus estimate of $6.15 by 7.8 percent. This is a 1941.67 percent increase over losses of $(0.36) per share from the same period last year. The company reported quarterly sales of $2.57 billion which beat the analyst consensus estimate of $2.41 billion by 6.60 percent. This is a 89.59 percent increase over sales of $1.35 billion the same period last year.

👉 $MSFT : Software leader Microsoft edged lower Monday, as the top Dow Jones stock looks for support around its long-term 200-day line.
